subject: Re: Hi!  I'm new to the group;
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I'm a ham too, but have stayed off the air since started with EVP in 
2000. For one thing I was afraid of ridicule, and another is this 
eats all of my "spare" time. I mentioned EVP to one of QRP club guys 
and he never spoke to me agian. I thinkit's time to try to set up 
some nets.

 Frank-S
